Not everything is going smoothly, and Ty has to run for a short time, a girl from escort services to raise the money needed to get started Hsu in the prestigious jewelry company. Xu rises quickly through the ranks thanks to successfully make contact with the boss's daughter (Suki Kwan), but one single lie that allowed the characters from the very beginning - said that they were brother and sister - in the end threatens to destroy their marriage.
